body_html:
@furybubu the way to troubleshoot this would be to isolate performance problem to individual ops.
There's probably a long road of improvements ahead in order to make TF make full use of Volta architectures.

For instance, here are some microbenchmarks on V100 using Amazon/Nvidia tensorflow images: https://medium.com/@yaroslavvb/peak-performance-of-amazon-p3-instances-f2bc48f9ef71
